comments.author: Coyote.1847
comments.body: That sounds cool, but might be really hard to implement game-wide unless it just affects the dialogue you’d make for activating skills. I remember this was asked a long time ago and the idea at the time was looked down on because the voice and sound teams worked really hard to get all that dialogue in there in the first place: there’s sooo much dialogue in this game and hiring more voice actors to read the same lines over and over or even voice modulation would be time and effort that could be best spent on other things. Yes, it would be more immersive but would also be a massive undertaking for such a small thing.

comments.author: Quben.6451
comments.body:
Dont know if this is in the right place to post this.

I was thinking it would be nice to have voice packs on the gem store for a bit more in-depth character customization. Maybe like 2 new female and 2 new male on each race. Maybe 400-800 gems?

Would also be nice if we would be able to dye our weapons to make them feel more unique to us and not feel like everyone is running around with the same weapon.

How do you all feel about this? Could it be something added in?
